quoteDatabaseEng.text: If I could have just one dance with you, I would pick a song that never ends.
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: It may seem as the hardest thing to do, but you have to forget the guy who forgot about you
quoteDatabaseEng.author: Nickolas Sparks

quoteDatabaseEng.text: these changes ain't changing me, the cold hearted boy i used to be;
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text:
You can leave me here
In my dreams and fear
All along on the floor
Shut the windows, close the door
I would lay here in the dust
With no future and no past
You can call me any time
I'm only witness of your crime
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: i used to want you dead but now i only want you gone;
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: The most important 3 words you can say to yourself : Yes, I can
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: you're not a failure until you give up
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: We have demons, and we let them destroy us or we tame them. If you cannot control your demons, whoever or whatever they are, you do harm to others. I found the way to cage mine, that was all. Anger, jealousy, envy, revengefulness, vanity. I locked them up in a diary.
quoteDatabaseEng.author: unknown

quoteDatabaseEng.text: Any time a friend recommends their therapist it’s like... I’ve seen their work. Not for me
quoteDatabaseEng.author: Justin Clark
